classification.task_goal: Improve a prompt for a Stable Diffusion AI model to create an anime-style wallpaper.
primary_constraints: The face composed of symbols must occupy 20% of the wallpaper.
The face should be centered on the image.
The color palette must include pink, violet, white, blue, and yellow.
The wallpaper must be of 4K resolution and high quality.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially modified the color palette and did not include the 4K resolution constraint. The user later pointed out the omission, and the AI corrected it, thus enforcing the constraints afterward.
